page.title: 12Coming to Bwlch-y-groes (2)
page.content: The real difference is more subtle and difficult to describe.We arrived,on a freezing day in March,to find the previous owner had lit the fire and left us a bag of logs.The old lady over the road bustled round with tea,cakes and useful information.We were new to livestock but neighbours were always ready to help and advise,and never treated us as the idiots they probably thought we were.The farms here are still small,the occupants largely inter-related.There is continuity.The driver of the once weekly bus does not issue tickets - there is no need,he knows his passengers.It is a community,not just a collection of strangers passing through;{that}is the difference.We hope our roots are beginning to grow.
